story_10_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hmph. It seems these kids are a bit more
than we can handle at present...
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Let’s retreat for now. But mark my words...
the next time we meet, we’ll be far stronger!
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Guess you had to come to my rescue again,
huh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... Thanks.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Tsk! Do you need to have your ears cleaned?
I told you it would be unwise to rush in like that.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Oh well. What’s done is done.
At least this allowed me to witness
something great.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You got upset when your friend’s pride
was insulted, then fought hard to defend it.
That’s not something you see every day.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
All right! Now that we’ve chased off those
scalawags, you are free to challenge me
for a badge once again.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But you must be exhausted, my friends.
Why don’t you take a rest here and catch up
with me on the road ahead?
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Hapu’s got a point. We should take a quick
break here so that we’re back to full power
when we challenge her!
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Sorry, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I think I’m gonna go.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
What? Why?
You didn’t get hurt back there, did you?
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
No, it’s not that.
After my battle with Hapu, she told me that
what I’m missing is self-confidence...
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
and I need to give that some real thought.
Challenging her again is gonna be pointless
until I figure out my issues.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’m not giving up yet, though!
I’ve still got time to work this out before
the tournament matches begin!
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You’ll see! I’ll continue to get stronger,
collect all the badges I need, then sign up
to compete in the PML!
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Good luck in your battle against Hapu!
I’ll see you around soon!
story_10_05000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Wow, he just up and left...
Think Paulo’s gonna be OK?
story_10_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Why are you so worried about Paulo, anyway?
We’ll see him again real soon, like he said.
story_10_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
And when we do, I’m sure he will have
grown into a powerful rival for us to
compete against.
story_10_05000/2401_0302_2400_10:
We’ll grow even more powerful
than that!
story_10_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
All right! Let’s head out as soon as this
rest stop is over. Final badge, here we come!
